mapper.select: SELECT BASKET_NO, b.USER_NO, ITEM_NO, b.ITEM_QUAN, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_IMAGE FROM ITEM_BASKET b JOIN BOARD_ITEM USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY BASKET_NO DESC
SELECT SUM(QUAN * ITEM_PRICE) FROM (SELECT BASKET_NO, USER_NO, ITEM_NO, IB.ITEM_QUAN "QUAN", ITEM_PRICE FROM ITEM_BASKET IB JOIN BOARD_ITEM USING(ITEM_NO)) WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
